rooms.name: Open Living & Kitchen Area
rooms.description: A spacious area combining living space and kitchen with an integrated farmhouse aesthetic. The layout is designed to promote natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows, predominantly located along the west side for enhanced evening brightness.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A private sanctuary for the family head. Incorporates Bohemian elements with rustic decor and ample storage. The room is strategically placed to capture gentle sunlight while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy bedroom designed for the remaining family members. Blends farmhouse aesthetics with bohemian flair, ensuring comfort and style.

rooms.name: Bathroom & Laundry Area
rooms.description: A functional area combining a full bathroom and laundry facilities. The layout is optimized for efficient workflow while aligning with Vastu by placing water outlets in the north-east to attract abundance.

rooms.name: Open Terrace
rooms.description: An extended living space that flows seamlessly from the interior. Equipped with floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side to create a bright and inviting ambiance.

openings.description: Large, expansive windows that enhance natural light and ensure a panoramic view of the sunset. Complies with local building norms for window size and safety.
openings.vastu_note: Ideal placement to attract positive energy in the evenings.

openings.description: A modern glass door that provides an inviting entry point while balancing aesthetics with privacy. Aligns with Vastu principles by directing energy flow towards the center of the apartment.
openings.vastu_note: Supports open and positive spatial dynamics.

openings.description: A door leading from the living space to the outdoor terrace, facilitating smooth movement and blending indoor/outdoor living.
